alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otter Tail County through 315 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Edwards, or 12 miles north of Fergus Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Lida, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake, Erhard, Maplewood State Park, Edwards and Vergas. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail
